title: More currency, banks less able to expand credit

content.prompt: If the public's desire to hold money as currency increases, what will the impact be on the banking system?

choices.label: Banks would be more able to reduce unemployment.
Banks would be more able to decrease aggregate supply.
Banks would be less able to decrease aggregate supply.
Banks would be more able to expand credit.
Banks would be less able to expand credit.

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
